common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]

error_list.name: product.error_busi
error_list.description: The GTIN code is mandatory, please check and upload again.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: error_auth
error_list.description: cnsc shop not upgraded, can not edit item.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Parameter is not match the constraints, {{.error_info}}.

error_list.name: error_incalid_brand
error_list.description: Brand ID or brand name required

error_list.name: error_get_shop_fail
error_list.description: Get shop failed. please try later.

error_list.name: error_busi_update_item_failed
error_list.description: Update item failed, please try later.

error_list.name: error_inner
error_list.description: Our system is taking some time to respond, please try later.

error_list.name: error_inner
error_list.description: System error, please try again later or contact the OpenAPI support team.

error_list.name: error_repeated_mtsku
error_list.description: A similar product has already been uploaded

error_list.name: error_invalid_price
error_list.description: Invalid price, please use the correct format

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Attribute format is invalid. NCC field only allows Eng Alphanumeric input

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: NCC filed only allows character length less than 50.

error_list.name: error_unlist_item_fail
error_list.description: Please upload your products to UNLIST status. Products will be published automatically by Shopee at the official launch date.

error_list.name: error_invalid_price_for_logistic
error_list.description: Shipping channel cannot be enabled as product price exceeds limit.

error_list.name: error_inner
error_list.description: System error, please try again later or contact the OpenAPI support team.

error_list.name: error_inner
error_list.description: System error, please try again later or contact the OpenAPI support team.

error_list.name: error_auth
error_list.description: The current item belong to the full FBS or B2C shop, so normal stock must be equal to 0

error_list.name: error_param_validate
error_list.description: This is not a valid GTIN. Please, inform a valid number.

error_list.name: error_param_validate
error_list.description: This is not a valid GTIN. Please, inform a valid number.

error_list.name: error_busi_cannot_edit_vsku
error_list.description: Can not use OpenAPI to edit/create VSKU, please connect with your manager

error_list.name: error_param_validate
error_list.description: Wholesale cannot be used in this category and attributes.

error_list.name: error_auth
error_list.description: Your shop can not use model level dts

error_list.name: error attribute
error_list.description: Your attribute info is invalid. Please fill in the category related attributes with correct attribute value.

error_list.name: error_busi
error_list.description: The merchant/shop has multi warehouse, please input location id

error_list.name: error category
error_list.description: Your category is invalid or prohibited.

error_list.name: error brand
error_list.description: Your brand is invalid. Please use the valid brand under your category.

error_list.name: error_marshal
error_list.description: Interal error, please contact openapi team

error_list.name: error_system_busy
error_list.description: Our system is taking some time to respond, please try later.

error_list.name: error_nil_item_in_req
error_list.description: Interal error, please contact openapi team.

error_list.name: error_image_unavailable
error_list.description: Image is invalid: single image url length is less than 32.

error_list.name: error_item_uneditable
error_list.description: Can't edit this item. item status can not support editing.

error_list.name: error_desc_hash_tag_over_limit
error_list.description: Count of hash tags is more than 18

error_list.name: error_item_name_empty
error_list.description: Item name could not be empty.

error_list.name: error_item_name_is_too_short
error_list.description: Item_name length is less than min limit.

error_list.name: error_title_exceeds_max_length
error_list.description: The length of item_name is bigger than max limit.

error_list.name: error_desc_length_min_limit
error_list.description: Description length is less than the min limit.

error_list.name: error_cannt_edit_name_in_promotion
error_list.description: Item_name cannot be edited when item is under promotion..

error_list.name: error_cannt_edit_description_in_promotion
error_list.description: Description of item cannot be edited when item is under promotion..

error_list.name: error_cannt_edit_image_in_promotion
error_list.description: Image of item cannot be edited when item is under promotion..

error_list.name: error_cannt_edit_pre_order_in_promotion
error_list.description: Item cannot be changed to pre-order when item is under promotion..

error_list.name: error_cannt_edit_estimated_days_in_promotion
error_list.description: Days_to_ship cannot be edited when item is under promotion.

error_list.name: error_item_in_promotion
error_list.description: item is in promotion can not set category

error_list.name: error_category_level
error_list.description: Interal error, please contact openapi team.

error_list.name: error_category_path_count_limit
error_list.description: Interal error, please contact openapi team.

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: Interal error, please contact openapi team.

error_list.name: error_incalid_category
error_list.description: Category IDs for L1 and L2 do not match.

error_list.name: error_category_dts
error_list.description: The current day_to_ship is bigger than category's max days_to_ship.

error_list.name: error_invalid_category
error_list.description: Category is blocked for CB seller.

error_list.name: error_in_item_promotion_image_item_lock
error_list.description: Can't update images when item is under promotion.

error_list.name: error_in_item_promotion_name_item_lock
error_list.description: Can't update item_name when item is under promotion.

error_list.name: error_in_item_promotion_unlsit_lock
error_list.description: Can't unlist item when item is under promotion.

error_list.name: error_in_item_promotion_description_lock
error_list.description: Can't update description when item is under promotion.

error_list.name: error_flash_sale_days_to_ship_lock
error_list.description: Days_to ship cannot be changed when item is under ongoing/upcoming flash sale.

error_list.name: error_slash_price_not_lowest
error_list.description: In slash sale, price should not be lower or same as slash price.

error_list.name: error_whole_sale_min_count_incorrect
error_list.description: Interal error, please contact openapi team.

error_list.name: error_whole_sale_price_setting_incorrect
error_list.description: Wholesale price can't more than original price.

For more information, please visit the market's respective Seller Education Hub.","key":"GsHCHCt"},{"name":"tax_info","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"object","children":[{"name":"ncm","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"

Mercosur Common Nomenclature, it is a convention between Mercosur member countries to easily recognize goods, services and productive factors negotiated among themselves. (BR region)


NCM must have 8 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a NCM enter the value \"00\"

","key":"MksBRwh"},{"name":"same_state_cfop","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in the same state. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.","key":"bJTSZbz"},{"name":"diff_state_cfop","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in different states. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.","key":"nKSSBAe"},{"name":"csosn","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Code of Operation Status – Simples Nacional, code for company operations to identify the origin of the goods and the taxation regime of the operations.","key":"NBTnhmS"},{"name":"origin","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Product source, domestic or foreig","key":"mjMhJXQ"},{"name":"cest","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"

Tax Replacement Specifying Code (CEST), to separate within the same NCM products that do or do not have ICMS tax substitution. (BR region)

CEST must have 7 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a CEST enter the value \"00\".

","key":"jjphnsz"},{"name":"measure_unit","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"(BR region)","key":"xYesetM"},{"name":"invoice_option","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Value shuold be one of NO_INVOICES VAT_MARGIN_SCHEME_INVOICES VAT_INVOICES NON_VAT_INVOICES and if value is NON_VAT_INVOICE vat_rate should be null (PL region)","key":"XfybDzG"},{"name":"vat_rate","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Value should be one of 0% 5% 8% 23% NO_VAT_RATE (PL region)","key":"XkZmimr"},{"name":"hs_code","limits":"1234","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"HS Code. (Only for IN region)","key":"YRhTzZi"},{"name":"tax_code","limits":"GEN_Zero","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Tax Code. (Only for IN region)","key":"iDTKkrZ"},{"description":"

tax_type only for TW whitelist shop. Shopee will referred Tax type when substitute sellers for issuing e-receipts to buyers. All variations share the same tax type. The meaning of value: 

0: no tax type

1: tax-able

2: tax-free

","name":"tax_type","sample":"","type":"int32","required":"False","key":"zCWHnKY"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

PIS - Programa de Integração Social (Social Integration Program). It is a government tax to collect resources for the payment of unemployment insurance and other employee related rights.

PIS % - the tax applied to this product

","name":"pis","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"phDPphH"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

COFINS – Contribuição para Financiamento da Seguridade Social (Contribution for Social Security Funding). It is a government tax to collect resources for public health system and social security.

COFINS % - the tax applied to this product

","name":"cofins","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"GmkhNt"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

ICMS - Imposto sobre Circulação de Mercadorias e Serviços (Circulation of Goods and Services Tax). 

CST - Código da Situação Tributária (Tax Situation Code) is represented by a combination of 3 numbers with the purpose of demonstrating the origin of a product and determining the form of taxation that will apply to it. Therefore, each digit in the CST Table has a specific meaning: the first digit indicates the origin of the operation, the second digit represents the ICMS taxation on the operation and the third digit provides additional information about the form of taxation.

","name":"icms_cst","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"HSBsZCt"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

The CST PIS/Cofins is a code on the Electronic Invoice (NF-e) that identifies the tax situation of PIS (Programa de Integração Social) and Cofins (Contribuição para o Financiamento da Seguridade Social) in sales of goods.

","name":"pis_cofins_cst","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"xPbneDT"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

Enter the total percentage of the combination of federal, state, and municipal taxes, using up to two decimals.

","name":"federal_state_taxes","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"TePPrWF"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

1: Retailer

2: Manufacturer

","name":"operation_type","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"FkzEmiD"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

The EXTIPI field in the NF-e (Nota Fiscal Eletrônica) is used to indicate if there's an exception to the IPI (Imposto sobre Produtos Industrializados) tax rate for a specific product.

","name":"ex_tipi","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"jKYMtmW"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

The FCI Control Number is a unique identifier assigned to each import FCI (Import Content Form). It's mandatory on the corresponding NF-e (electronic invoice) to ensure compliance with Brazilian import tax regulations.

","name":"fci_num","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"GGfKcPy"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

RECOPI NACIONAL is a Brazilian government system that facilitates the registration and management of tax-exempt operations involving paper destined for printing books, newspapers, and periodicals (known as \"papel imune\" in Portuguese).

","name":"recopi_num","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"bhytwDY"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

Include relevant information to display on Invoice.

","name":"additional_info","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"eMYSRfk"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

Required if the item is a group item.

","name":"group_item_info","sample":"","type":"object","required":"False","key":"QxxHRkb","children":[{"description":"

Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter 6.

","name":"group_qtd","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"hCwpCkz"},{"description":"

Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter UNI for the individual can.

","name":"group_unit","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"bdtHBNX"},{"description":"

Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unity), enter the value of the individual can.

","name":"group_unit_value","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"RnCjMjY"},{"description":"

Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Enter the price of the whole package.

","name":"original_group_price","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"XDDhFce"},{"description":"

Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GTIN SSCC code for the package.

","name":"group_gtin_sscc","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"QRdsRrT"},{"description":"

Example: The item is box, that contain 6 packages. Each package contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GRAI GTIN SSCC code for the Box.

","name":"group_grai_gtin_sscc","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"JhGiywr"}]},{"description":"


7101 - for sales of self-produced goods

7102 - resale of third-party goods

","name":"export_cfop","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"BnmjjiA"}],"description":"Tax information","key":"aFGfbCH"},{"name":"complaint_policy","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"object","children":[{"name":"warranty_time","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Value should be in one of ONE_YEAR TWO_YEARS OVER_TWO_YEARS.","key":"YHeETh"},{"name":"exclude_entrepreneur_warranty","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"boolean","description":"If True means \"I exclude warranty complaints for entrepreneur\"","key":"yGTFZZ"},{"name":"complaint_address_id","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"int32","description":" Address for complaint. Fetch available addresses using v2.logistics.get_address_list, and use address_id returned from it.","key":"aiNimbb"},{"name":"additional_information","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Additional information for warranty claim. Should be less than 1000 characters.","key":"JRYTiQH"}],"description":"Complaint Policy for item. Only required for local PL sellers, ignored otherwise.","key":"PnehFYD"},{"name":"description_info","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"object","children":[{"name":"extended_description","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"object","children":[{"name":"field_list","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"object[]","children":[{"name":"field_type","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Type of extended description field ：values: See Data Definition- description_field_type (text , image).","key":"rzQaFPa"},{"name":"text","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"If field_type is text， text information will be set by this field.","key":"STihBAM"},{"name":"image_info","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"object","children":[{"name":"image_id","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Image id.","key":"zBkJxn"}],"description":"If field_type is image，image url will be set by this field.","key":"QjRtiXS"}],"description":"Field of extended description.","key":"XrYHfw"}],"description":"If description_type is extended , description information should be set by this field.","key":"HhEnYBZ"}],"description":"New description field. Only whitelist sellers can use it. If you use the field, please upload the description_type=extended otherwise api will return error. If you don't use this field, you don't need to upload the description_type or upload description_type=normal","key":"sXFyJwi"},{"name":"description_type","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Values: See Data Definition- description_type (normal , extended). If you want to use extended_description or change description type ,this field must be inputed","key":"tfXRPHr"},{"description":"

- GTIN is an identifier for trade items, developed by the international organization GS1.
- They have 8 to 14 digits. The most common are UPC, EAN, JAN and ISBN.
- GTIN will help boost positioning in online marketing channels like Google and Facebook.
- That incorporation with GTIN will also aid in Search and Recommendation in Shopee itself allowing buyers to have higher likelihood of finding one's listing.


Note: If you want to set “Item without GTIN”, please pass the gtin_code as \"00\".

The validation rule is based on the value return in gtin_validation_rule\" field in v2.product.get_item_limit API

- Mandatory: This field is required and must contain a correctly formatted GTiN number.

- Flexible: This field is required and must contain either a correctly formatted GTlN number or \"00\" to declare that the item/model has no valid GTlN.
- Optional: This field is optional and can contain a correctly formatted GTiN number, \"00\" or be omitted entirely.

","name":"gtin_code","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"JQtFEFx"},{"description":"

category recommendation service id

","name":"ds_cat_rcmd_id","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"TSHTcKE"},{"description":"

Promotion Image
Currently only allow one promoton image
You could set promotion image only if the product images' ratio is 3:4

","name":"promotion_images","sample":"","type":"object","required":"False","key":"pfsBtEZ","children":[{"description":"

Promotion Image

","name":"image_id_list","sample":"","type":"string[]","required":"False","key":"pjwbGGA"}]},{"description":"","name":"compatibility_info","sample":"","type":"object","required":"False","key":"YwQMWYD","children":[{"description":"","name":"vehicle_info_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":"True","key":"pJhSMSA","children":[{"description":"

ID of the brand.

","name":"brand_id","sample":"1234","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"WfYBMCF"},{"description":"

ID of the model.

","name":"model_id","sample":"2345","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"mnnPpKN"},{"description":"

ID of the year.

","name":"year_id","sample":"3456","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"EYDXcRR"},{"description":"

ID of the version.

","name":"version_id","sample":"4567","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"JFBEpNz"}]}]},{"description":"

Scheduled publish time of this item: 

1) Can only set scheduled_publish_time for item with UNLIST status

2) Can only set the time from current time +1hour to current time +90days, and the time is only allowed to be accurate to the minute

","name":"scheduled_publish_time","sample":"1733590920","type":"timestamp","required":"False","key":"iYtCGRd"},{"description":"

ID of authorised reseller brand.

","name":"authorised_brand_id","sample":"","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"CsxJitF"},{"description":"


","name":"size_chart_info","sample":"","type":"object","required":"False","key":"WscAkRX","children":[{"description":"

ID of size chart image. If you want to remove the image size chart of the item, please pass the \"size_chart\" empty.


You only need to fill out either the image or template. If both are filled, only the template will be kept.


Notes: Both CB shops and local shops are supported to set \"size_chart\".

","name":"size_chart","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"AYandxX"},{"description":"
